title: Spacious and elegant! You've found your ideal 2 bed / 2 bath!
posting_body: ['-- Residences at Stevens Pond --', '(781) 232-7097', 'Monthly Rent:', 'Please call', 'Apartment:', '2 Bedroom | 2 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '1275', 'sq ft', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'The Residences at Stevens Pond is conveniently located just minutes from US-1, I-95, and I-93 for a quick trip to Boston.', 'Our community is also surrounded by the beautiful Breakheart Reservation, making for a serene and quaint setting.', 'Plus, we are just walking distance away from elementary schools in the neighborhood.', 'This three story townhouse has its living and dining spaces on a separate level from the bedrooms, allowing for a lot of privacy and comfortable living!', 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge monthly pet rent of $75, per pet per month.', 'Breed Restriction.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '❖ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '❖ Indoor Half-Basketball Court', '❖ Online Payments', '❖ Online Payments Available', '❖ Online Work Orders', '❖ Proud Affiliate of the NAA', '❖ Virtual Golf Simulator', '❖ Arcade Games and Billiards Table', '❖ Clubhouse (Newly Renovated!)', '❖ Fitness Center (State-of-the-Art with over $40k of New Equipment)', '❖ Outdoor Pavilion/Fireplace', '❖ Pool (Newly Upgraded)', '❖ Pool Deck (Brand New!)', '❖ Spa (Heated)', '❖ Tot Lot (Outdoor Little Tikes Play Area)', 'Apartment features include:', '❖ Central A/C', '❖ Full-size Washer and Dryer', '❖ Fully-Equipped Kitchen with Gas Range', '❖ Gas Burning Fireplaces In Select Units', '❖ Generous Closet Space', '❖ Loft Style Apartments In Select Units', '❖ Newly Renovated Units', '❖ Pre-Wired for High-Speed Internet and Cable Access', '❖ Private Patios and Balconies', '❖ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Phone:', '(781) 232-7097', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '1 Founders Way', 'Saugus, MA 01906', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Managed by JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '3431AD5F3CB64A1']
